client.implementation

Class ClientDisplayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • client.implementation.ClientDisplayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClientDisplayerInterface, java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote

    public class ClientDisplayer
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements ClientDisplayerInterface, java.io.Serializable
    This class is the displayer that defines the clients attributes
    Author:
    Grumpy Group
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
